# --- end cisst license ---

# name of project and executable
PROJECT(multiTaskTutorialExample1-graph)

# use CMake provided script to locate FLTK
FIND_PACKAGE(FLTK REQUIRED)

# add include paths
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${multiTaskTutorialExample1-graph_SOURCE_DIR}
                    ${cisst_SOURCE_DIR}/libs/etc
                    ${FLTK_INCLUDE_DIR})

# magic CMake command, generate .cxx and .h from .fl files
# then compile them and link them with the executable
FLTK_WRAP_UI(multiTaskTutorialExample1-graph OscilloscopeUI.fl)

# name the main executable and specifies with source files to use
ADD_EXECUTABLE(multiTaskTutorialExample1-graph
               # code files to compile
               sineTask.cpp
               displayTask.cpp
               main.cpp
               # header files are provided for information
               sineTask.h
               displayTask.h
               # files generated by fluid
	           ${multiTaskTutorialExample1-graph_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
	           )

# this program 
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(multiTaskTutorialExample1-graph ${FLTK_LIBRARIES})

# link with the cisst libraries
CISST_REQUIRES("multiTaskTutorialExample1-graph" "cisstCommon;cisstOSAbstraction;cisstMultiTask")
